name: Breakout (itch) (chesetti)
description:
My second game on itch.io!

Again for educational purposes. All of the code is at https://github.com/droidkid/breakout.

Written in C++, using SDL2, SDL_Image and SDL_TTF. Assets from kenney.nl.

Use the mouse to control the paddle. You only live once, so if the ball falls below the screen it's game over.

There's only one level in here.
